outputs.name: program
outputs.description:
A ProgramType object that's a weighted average between the
input _programs.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the name for the ProgramType and to be incorporated
into a unique ProgramType identifier.

inputs.name: _programs
inputs.description:
A list of ProgramType objects that will be averaged
together to make a new ProgramType.

inputs.name: _ratios_
inputs.description:
A list of fractional numbers with the same length as the input
programs that sum to 1. These will be used to weight each of the
ProgramType objects in the resulting average. If None, the input
program objects will be weighted equally. Default: None.

name: HB Blend ProgramTypes
description:
Create a ProgramType object by blending other ProgramTypes together using a weighted
average based on program ratios.
-
